description: A mysterious island in the New World that is half frozen and half burning, formerly a government research facility now occupied by Caesar Clown.

keyEvents.title: Mocha's Arrival Flashback
keyEvents.description: Flashback reveals how Mocha and other children were brought to Punk Hazard by Caesar Clown under false pretenses.
keyEvents.significance: Exposes the dark history of Caesar's experiments on children at this facility.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Monet Battle
keyEvents.description: Zoro engages in combat with Monet within the Punk Hazard facility to protect his crewmates.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle taking place in the research facility corridors.

statusHistory.reason: Island is currently occupied by Caesar Clown and his operations
